entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Cornwall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:03 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Anicet 10:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.5°C
Wind: NE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Thursday: Freezing rain or rain. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets and snow beginning near noon then changing to rain this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
